# AVAudioUnitTimePitch

**Class**

An object that provides a good-quality playback rate and pitch shifting independently of each other.

## Declaration

```swift
class AVAudioUnitTimePitch
```

## Getting and setting time pitch values

- **overlap**: The amount of overlap between segments of the input audio signal.
- **pitch**: The amount to use to pitch shift the input signal.
- **rate**: The playback rate of the input signal.

## Time effects

- **AVAudioUnitTimeEffect**: An object that processes audio in nonreal time.
- **AVAudioUnitVarispeed**: An object that allows control of the playback rate.

## Inherits From

- AVAudioUnitTimeEffect

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
